examples.example: 你的这个提议很有意思，我非常愿意尝试。

translate.english: Your this proposal is very interesting, and I am very willing to try.

examples.example: 和朋友们一起玩游戏真有意思。

translate.english: Playing games with friends is really interesting.

examples.example: 和家人一起分享生活中的点滴真的很有意思。

translate.english: Sharing the bits and pieces in life with family members is really very interesting.
